title: Mufin Finance acquires APM Finvest for Rs 76 crore, aims to create EV financing ecosystem - Economic Times
content: Mufin Finance acquires APM Finvest for Rs 76 crore, aims to create EV financing ecosystem  Economic Times
description: Citing a study by CEEW-Centre for Energy Finance (CEEW-CEF), it said the EV market in India is estimated to reach USD 206 billion by 2030 if the country maintains steady progress to meet its ambitious target of 100 per cent electrification by 2030.
